translation.english: Yes, hello, good morning to you.
Hello? Hello, good morning. How are you?

translation.tagalog: Gina Jane Quinta Negra Francis, tama po.
translation.english: Gina Quinta Negra Francis is right.

translation.tagalog: Apo, mamagandang umaga. Ito po si Christine from AMC Collections on behalf of Maya. Right?
translation.english: Good morning, this is Christine from AMC Collections on behalf of Maya.

translation.tagalog: Apo, for account security lamang po yung last formal number para may note ito po. 7937, confirm po ba? Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam? Ang sabi niyo po.
translation.english: I'm not sure if the last number is the same as the last, but I'm sure it's the same as the last number. $797 is the last number for security.

translation.tagalog: Yes po. Yung... yung Juko tapos yung Astadine Balance po.
translation.english: Yes, that's right, the Juke is the last one.

translation.tagalog: Apo, magkano po yung total lahat niyo na para may document ko on your account?
translation.english: How much is the total amount of money that you have to deposit into your account?

translation.tagalog: So, nag-zero na po sa inyong Maya.
translation.english: So, you've got zero on your Maya.

translation.tagalog: Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam?
translation.english: Grandpa, how much was the payment last night?

translation.tagalog: Ano po? Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam?
translation.english: How much was the rent last night, Mom?

translation.tagalog: Apo, pero kung naalala mo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment para may document natin on your account?
translation.english: If you're wondering how much is the deposit required to get a document in your account?

translation.tagalog: At the same time, nag-sit sa apps niyo, no? Tama po?
translation.english: At the same time, you're sitting on your apps, right?

translation.tagalog: seven... Hindi ko matanan. Ano po yan?
translation.english: Seven... I can't see. What is that?

translation.tagalog: Nag-sit na po sa apps, kumaga wala na po kayong unsettled payment.
translation.english: You're on the app, you're not getting any unsettled payments.

translation.tagalog: Nab. Wala na po. Ah... yes.
translation.english: There is no more. Ah... yes.

translation.tagalog: Nakapag-reload na po ba kayo, ma?
Kumbaga, nahiram niyo po ba or hindi pa po?
translation.english: Kumbaga, have you borrowed or not yet?

translation.tagalog: Hiniram ko uli yung pera po?
translation.english: Did I borrow the money again?

translation.tagalog: Okay po. Sige, ma'am. In-annotate ko po at the same time. Salamat po sa pagtanggap sa tawag at sa pagbabayad po.
